CustomField.description: Opportunity Contact with Role = “Legal Advisor to Company/Debtor” is required. However, if the Opportunity does not have a contact to assign that role, then user will need to check the new field “No Legal Advisor to Company/Debtor” on the opportunity page, negating the requirement.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Yes, add the contacts under opp contacts and select the role Legal Advisor to Company/Debtor.
CustomField.label: Legal Advisor to Company
